name: kloggies
tag_list: social, network, community, digital-media, web2-0, chat, thread, one-to-one, conversation, klog
overview:
Company Overview: kloggies is a web 2.0 company | Mission: kloggies aims Social Communication and Digital Media Sharing

Do you feel alone on the web? Are you surfing sites, communities or social networks but didnâ€™t find real connection, relation, friendship? This time is over. Now you can find something strong, genuine and intimate.

Kloggies.com is come.

Kloggies.com is the community of one-to-one conversations. People in the community are named kloggies and one-to-one conversations are named klog.

Kloggies.com is the social network where kloggies share klogs.

The purpose of kloggies.com is to find a web 2.0 environment where people generate attractive content, because the dual communication is the most intimacy and gorgeous.

The klog has three main features: topic, scope and format. > Topic is the main object of the conversation. Some examples can be music, art, culture, sport, love, finance, innovation, job, green, job, cinema, business, brand, medicine, products, services, etc. >Scope is the reason why kloggies are talking. Examples of scopes can be friendship, interview, collaboration, blogging, information, challenge, relationship, entertainment, work, editing, confession, play, etc. >Format can be chat or thread. Chat is made of instant messaging. Thread is made of mail exchanging.

In order to start klogging, a new klog must be created. The kloggie who creates the new klog is the klog owner. The owner chooses a klog title, main features (topic, scope, and format) and other attributes. After creating the klog, the owner must send it two another kloggie, the receiver. When the receiver accepts the invitation, the klog will start.

Klog can be private or public. The klog owner set this attribute. If the klog is public, people in the community can view it and comment or valuate it as well.
